resources.string: We are studying at BTPIT! Nikita Kirpichnikov

Students of 1-4 courses of the specialty: \"Preschool Education\" of the Borisoglebsk College of Industrial and Information Technologies, together with teachers Larisa Vladimirovna Grebennikova and Margarita Mikhailovna Lugovina, on February 13, on the basis of the Borisoglebsk branch of the N.F. Bunakov VIRO, as part of the activities of the Mentor for a Young Teacher club, took part in a workshop on the topic: \"Methods and methods of forming a child\'s research behavior as a condition for his self-development.\" During this educational intensive, Olga Nikolaevna, regional methodologist, teacher-psychologist of MBDOU \"Novokhopersky Child Development Center \"Childhood Pier\", shared her work experience. Read more on our website -> https://btpit36.ru/
